description: ChatGPT 5.2 Chat is the Instant mode of GPT-5.2, tuned for quick replies without step-by-step thinking. It provides high-quality answers with minimal latency, ideal for interactive chat and simple questions. This mode uses the full 400K-token context of GPT-5.2 but produces answers directly (no <think> reasoning output) for speed. Priced at ~$1.75/M input and $14/M output tokens, it balances cost and performance. ChatGPT 5.2 Chat is typically auto-selected for everyday queries, offering rapid responses while still benefiting from GPT-5.2's vast knowledge and multimodal understanding.
